ARABIC: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْءَالِهَةَ إِلَٰهًا وَٰحِدًا إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Has he turned all the gods into One God? That is truly astonishing!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Has he turned so many gods into one deity? This is indeed a strange thing!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Has he made the gods one single God? This is truly astounding.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They say, "Has he condemned all other gods but One? This is certainly strange".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Has he made all the Gods into One God? This is really something very strange!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Has he made the gods into One God. Verily, this is a curious thing!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! makes he the gods a single Allah? A strange thing is this, to be sure!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, has he made the gods One God? This is indeed a marvellous thing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Maketh he the gods One Allah? Lo! that is an astounding thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Does he make all the deities out to be one God? This is indeed a strange thing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Maketh he the gods One God? Verily that is a thing astounding!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Has he reduced the gods to one god? This is indeed an odd thing!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Has he made the gods (all) into one Allah? Truly this is a wonderful thing!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Has he made the aliha (gods) (all) into One Ilah (God - Allah). Verily, this is a curious thing!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, has he made the gods One God? This is indeed a wondrous thing'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Did he turn all the gods into one God? This is something strange.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:5] Has he made the gods One God? — for he had said to them, ‘Say: there is no god except God’ — in other words [they objected]: how could one god suffice for all of creation? Lo! that is indeed a curious thing’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 520 (Maketh he the gods One God) could one God be sufficient to fulfil all our needs, as Muhammad claims? (Lo! That) which Muhammad says (is an astounding thing) is a bizarre thing.
